name: B.A.P.D.S.
description:
This game is a little experiment I was working on out of pure boredom and finished in about 3 days. In the game you answer survey questions about yourself for the British Army Recruitment team to look at  and deem you fit to be a part of the British Army. but things get strange.

IMPORTANT

(SPOILER) There is a segment in this game where is displays your own IP address and location. It does NOT perform any malicious activity with this information nor is this information saved anywhere.

This game contains depictions of supernatural activity, government portrayal and religion.

All the questions asked in the game ARE NOT stored
